trans-unit.source: Polar charts draw all axes of the same orientation in the same position, so using multiple axes of the same orientation can be confusing, unless the extra axes are only used to customize the grid. trans-unit.source: Portability notes: Some databases choose to delay preparing a query until it is executed the first time. In this case, preparing a syntactically wrong query succeeds, but every consecutive exec() will fail. When the database does not support named placeholders directly, the placeholder can only contain characters in the range [a-zA-Z0-9_].
trans-unit.target: 可移植性说明：一些数据库选择延迟准备查询，直到第一次执行查询为止。在这种情况下，语法错误的查询准备成功，但是每个连续的exec（）都会失败。当数据库不直接支持命名的占位符时，占位符只能包含[a-zA-Z0-9 _ ]范围内的字符。

trans-unit.source: Portability notes: Some databases choose to delay preparing a query until it is executed the first time. In this case, preparing a syntactically wrong query succeeds, but every consecutive exec() will fail. When the database does not support named placeholders directly, the placeholder can only contain characters in the range [a-zA-Z0-9_].
trans-unit.target: 可移植性说明：一些数据库选择延迟准备查询，直到第一次执行查询为止。在这种情况下，语法错误的查询准备成功，但是每个连续的exec（）都会失败。当数据库不直接支持命名的占位符时，占位符只能包含[a-zA-Z0-9_]范围内的字符。

Positive lookahead. This assertion is true if the expression matches at this point in the regexp. For example, const(?=\s+char) matches 'const' whenever it is followed by 'char', as in 'static const char *'. (Compare with const\s+char, which matches 'static const char *'.)

trans-unit.source: Post-processing effects apply one or more fragment shaders to the result of a View3D. The output from these fragment shaders is then displayed instead of the original rendering results. This is conceptually very similar to Qt Quick's ShaderEffect and ShaderEffectSource.
trans-unit.target: 后处理效果将一个或多个片段着色器应用于View3D的结果。然后显示这些片段着色器的输出，而不是原始渲染结果。从概念上讲，这与Qt Quick的ShaderEffect和ShaderEffectSource非常相似。

trans-unit.source: Post-processing effects, where one or more passes of processing on the color buffer are performed, optionally taking the depth buffer into account, before the View3D's output is passed on to Qt Quick, also exist in two varieties:

trans-unit.source: Precompiled header support does not work in version 10.0.025 and older. For these compilers, you should configure Qt with -no-pch. Precompiled header support works properly in version 10.0.026 and later.
trans-unit.target: 预编译头支持在10.0.025和更老的版本中不起作用。对于这些编译器,你应该用-no-pch配置Qt。预编译头支持在 10.0.026 和更高版本中正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Precompiled headers (PCH) are a performance feature supported by some compilers to compile a stable body of code, and store the compiled state of the code in a binary file. During subsequent compilations, the compiler will load the stored state, and continue compiling the specified file. Each subsequent compilation is faster because the stable code does not need to be recompiled.
trans-unit.target: 预编译头(PCH)是一些编译器支持的一种性能特性,用于编译稳定的代码体,并将代码的编译状态存储在一个二进制文件中。在后续的编译过程中,编译器将加载存储的状态,并继续编译指定的文件。由于稳定的代码不需要重新编译,所以每次后续编译的速度都比较快。

trans-unit.source: Predicates can be used to further filter the nodes selected by a path expression. A predicate is an expression in square brackets ('[' and ']') that either returns a boolean value or a number. A predicate can appear at the end of any path step in a path expression. The predicate is applied to each node in the focus set. If a node passes the filter, the node is included in the result set. The query below selects the recipe element that has the <title> element "Hard-Boiled Eggs".
trans-unit.target: 谓词可用于进一步过滤由路径表达式选择的节点。谓词是方括号（“ [”和“]”）中的表达式，该表达式返回布尔值或数字。谓词可以出现在路径表达式中任何路径步骤的末尾。谓词将应用于焦点集中的每个节点。如果节点通过过滤器，则该节点将包含在结果集中。下面的查询选择具有 <title> 元素 "Hard-Boiled Eggs" 的配方元素。

trans-unit.source: Pressing Tab, in all window systems in common use today, moves the keyboard focus to the next widget in a circular per-window list. Tab moves focus along the circular list in one direction, Shift+Tab in the other. The order in which Tab presses move from widget to widget is called the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 在当今所有常用的窗口系统中，按Tab键，会将键盘焦点移到循环的每个窗口列表中的下一个窗口小部件。Tab沿圆形列表在一个方向上移动焦点，而Shift + Tab在另一个方向上移动。制表符按下的顺序从窗口小部件移到窗口小部件，这称为选项卡顺序。

trans-unit.source: Pressing the green Run button runs the application. You should see the text Hello, World! in the center of a red rectangle.

trans-unit.source: Primitive elements are GUI elements that are common and often used by several widgets. Examples of these are frames, button bevels, and arrows for spin boxes, scroll bars, and combo boxes. Primitive elements cannot exist on their own: they are always part of a larger construct. They take no part in the interaction with the user, but are passive decorations in the GUI.
trans-unit.target: 原始元素是常见的 GUI 元素,经常被几个小组件使用。这些元素的例子有框架、按钮斜面、旋转框的箭头、滚动条和组合框。原始元素不能单独存在:它们总是一个更大的结构的一部分。它们不参与与用户的交互,而是GUI中的被动装饰。

trans-unit.source: Prior to Qt 5.15, the old, unused background would be deleted to release the resources associated with it. However, as the control does not own the items, it should not delete them. As of Qt 5.15, old items are no longer deleted, and so the backgroundRect item will live longer than it needs to—typically until the application exits. Although the old item will be hidden, visually unparented from the control, and removed from the accessibility tree, it is important to keep the creation time and memory usage of these unused items in mind when assigning an id in this context.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt 5.15之前，旧的，未使用的背景将被删除以释放与其关联的资源。但是，由于控件不拥有这些项目，因此不应删除它们。从Qt 5.15开始，不再删除旧项目，因此 backgroundRect 项目的生存期将比其需要的寿命更长-通常直到应用程序退出为止。尽管旧项目将被隐藏，从控件中看不到父项并从可访问性树中删除，但是在此上下文中分配ID时，请记住这些未使用项目的创建时间和内存使用情况，这一点很重要。

trans-unit.source: Prior to Qt 6, QVector and QList were separate classes. In Qt 6, they are unified: Qt 5 QList implementation is gone and both classes use updated QVector implementation instead. QList is the class with the actual implementation and QVector is an alias (typedef) to QList.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt 6之前，QVector和QList是单独的类。在Qt 6中，它们是统一的：Qt 5 QList实现已消失，并且两个类都使用更新的QVector实现。QList是具有实际实现的类，而QVector是QList的别名（typedef）。

trans-unit.source: Prior to using QOpenGLTimeMonitor in your rendering function you should set the required number of sample points that you wish to record by calling setSamples(). Note that measuring N sample points will produce N-1 time intervals. Once you have set the number of sample points, call the create() function with a valid current OpenGL context to create the necessary query timer objects. These steps are usually performed just once in an initialization function.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染函数中使用QOpenGLTimeMonitor之前，应通过调用setSamples（）设置所需记录的采样点数。注意，测量N个采样点将产生N-1个时间间隔。设置采样点数量后，请使用有效的当前OpenGL上下文调用create（）函数以创建必要的查询计时器对象。这些步骤通常在初始化功能中仅执行一次。

trans-unit.source: Prior to using QOpenGLTimeMonitor in your rendering function you should set the required number of sample points that you wish to record by calling setSamples(). Note that measuring N sample points will produce N-1 time intervals. Once you have set the number of sample points, call the create() function with a valid current OpenGL context to create the necessary query timer objects. These steps are usually performed just once in an initialization function.

trans-unit.source: Processes all pending events for the calling thread according to the specified
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的处理方式,处理调用线程的所有待处理事件。

trans-unit.source: Processes have two predefined output channels: The standard output channel (stdout) supplies regular console output, and the standard error channel (stderr) usually supplies the errors that are printed by the process. These channels represent two separate streams of data. You can toggle between them by calling setReadChannel(). QProcess emits readyRead() when data is available on the current read channel. It also emits readyReadStandardOutput() when new standard output data is available, and when new standard error data is available, readyReadStandardError() is emitted. Instead of calling read(), readLine(), or getChar(), you can explicitly read all data from either of the two channels by calling readAllStandardOutput() or readAllStandardError().
trans-unit.target: 流程具有两个预定义的输出通道：标准输出通道（ stdout ）提供常规控制台输出，而标准错误通道（ stderr ）通常提供该过程打印的错误。这些通道代表两个单独的数据流。您可以通过调用setReadChannel（）在它们之间切换。当当前读取通道上有可用数据时，QProcess发出readyRead（）。当有新的标准输出数据可用时，它也会发出readyReadStandardOutput（），而当有新的标准错误数据可用时，也会发出readyReadStandardError（）。而不是调用read（），而是使用readLine（）或getChar（），您可以通过调用readAllStandardOutput（）或readAllStandardError（）显式地从两个通道之一读取所有数据。

trans-unit.source: Processes have two predefined output channels: The standard output channel (stdout) supplies regular console output, and the standard error channel (stderr) usually supplies the errors that are printed by the process. These channels represent two separate streams of data. You can toggle between them by calling setReadChannel(). QProcess emits readyRead() when data is available on the current read channel. It also emits readyReadStandardOutput() when new standard output data is available, and when new standard error data is available, readyReadStandardError() is emitted. Instead of calling read(), readLine(), or getChar(), you can explicitly read all data from either of the two channels by calling readAllStandardOutput() or readAllStandardError().
trans-unit.target: 流程具有两个预定义的输出通道：标准输出通道（ stdout ）提供常规控制台输出，而标准错误通道（ stderr ）通常提供由流程打印的错误。这些通道代表两个单独的数据流。您可以通过调用setReadChannel（）在它们之间切换。当当前读取通道上有可用数据时，QProcess发出readyRead（）。当有新的标准输出数据可用时，它也会发出readyReadStandardOutput（），而当有新的标准错误数据可用时，也会发出readyReadStandardError（）。而不是调用read（），readLine（）或getChar（），您可以通过调用readAllStandardOutput（）或readAllStandardError（）显式地从两个通道之一读取所有数据。

trans-unit.source: Product contains information about a product in the external market place. Once the product's identifier and type are set, the product will be queried from the external market place. Properties such as price will then be set, and it will be possible to purchase the product. The status property holds information on the registration process.
trans-unit.target: 产品包含有关外部市场上产品的信息。设置好产品的标识符和类型后，便可以从外部市场查询产品。然后将设置价格等属性，并可以购买该产品。该状态属性保存在注册过程的信息。

trans-unit.source: Product.Consumable The product is consumable and can be purchased more than once by the same user, granted that the transaction for the previous purchase has been finalized.
trans-unit.target: 产品.消耗品 该产品为消耗品,同一用户可以多次购买,前提是前一次购买的交易已经完成。

trans-unit.source: Product.PendingRegistration - Indicates that the product is currently being queried from the external market place. The product gets this status when its identifier is set.
trans-unit.target: Product.PendingRegistration-表示该产品目前正在从外部市场查询。当产品的标识符被设置后,产品就会得到这个状态。

trans-unit.source: Product.Registered - Indicates that the product was successfully found in the external market place. Its price can now be queried and the product can be purchased.
trans-unit.target: Product.Registered-表示该产品已在外部市场成功找到。现在可以查询其价格并购买该产品。

trans-unit.source: Product.Uninitialized - This is initial status, before the identifier property has been set.
trans-unit.target: Product.Uninitialized-这是初始状态,在标识符属性被设置之前。

trans-unit.source: Product.Unknown - The product could not be found in the external market place. This could for example be due to misspelling the product identifier.
trans-unit.target: Product.Unknown-在外部市场上找不到该产品。例如,这可能是由于拼错了产品标识符。

trans-unit.source: Product.Unlockable The product can only be purchased once per user. If the application is uninstalled and reinstalled on the device (or installed on a new device by the same user), purchases of unlockable products can be restored using the store's restorePurchases() method.
trans-unit.target: Product.Unlockable每个用户只能购买一次该产品。如果将应用程序卸载并重新安装在设备上（或由同一用户安装在新设备上），则可以使用商店的restorePurchases（）方法恢复对可解锁产品的购买。

trans-unit.target: 可编程材料、效果、几何和纹理数据。

trans-unit.source: Programming with a blocking serial port is radically different from programming with a non-blocking serial port. A blocking serial port does not require an event loop and typically leads to simpler code. However, in a GUI application, blocking serial port should only be used in non-GUI threads, to avoid freezing the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用阻塞串口进行编程与使用非阻塞串口进行编程是完全不同的。阻断串口不需要事件循环,通常会导致更简单的代码,但在GUI应用程序中,阻断串口只能在非GUI线程中使用,以避免冻结用户。然而,在GUI应用程序中,阻塞串口只能用于非GUI线程,以避免冻结用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Programming with a blocking socket is radically different from programming with a non-blocking socket. A blocking socket doesn't require an event loop and typically leads to simpler code. However, in a GUI application, blocking sockets should only be used in non-GUI threads, to avoid freezing the user interface. See the fortuneclient and blockingfortuneclient examples for an overview of both approaches.
trans-unit.target: 使用阻塞套接字进行编程与使用非阻塞套接字进行编程完全不同。阻塞套接字不需要事件循环，通常可以简化代码。但是，在GUI应用程序中，阻塞套接字只能在非GUI线程中使用，以避免冻结用户界面。有关这两种方法的概述，请参见fortuneclient和blockingfortuneclient示例。

trans-unit.source: Programs that perform long operations can call processEvents() with a bitwise OR combination of various QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag values to control which events should be delivered.

trans-unit.source: Progress bars can be vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 进度条可以是垂直或水平的。

trans-unit.source: Progress information is provided by the progressValue(), progressMinimum(), progressMaximum(), and progressText() functions. The waitForFinished() function causes the calling thread to block and wait for the computation to finish, ensuring that all results are available.
trans-unit.target: 进度信息由progressValue（），progressMinimum（），progressMaximum（）和progressText（）函数提供。该waitForFinished（）函数会导致调用线程被阻塞并等待计算到结束，以确保所有的结果都可用。

trans-unit.source: ProgressBar also supports a special indeterminate mode, which is useful, for example, when unable to determine the size of the item being downloaded, or if the download progress gets interrupted due to a network disconnection.
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar还支持特殊的不确定模式，例如，在无法确定正在下载的项目的大小，或者由于网络断开而导致下载进度中断时，该模式很有用。

trans-unit.source: ProgressBar indicates the progress of an operation. The value should be updated regularly. The range is defined by from and to, which both can contain any value.
trans-unit.target: ProgressBar指示操作的进度。该值应定期更新。范围由from和to定义，两者都可以包含任何值。

trans-unit.source: Progressive AA (PAA) operates on an entire layer. When all content of the layer has stopped moving, the camera is jiggled
trans-unit.target: 渐进式AA(PAA)对整个图层进行操作。当图层的所有内容都停止移动时,摄像机会被抖动。

trans-unit.source: Progressive Antialiasing is only performed when a scene is not being updated. When enabled, an update is forced and the current state of the scene is rendered with very small adjustments to the active cameras direction. Up to 8 frames are accumulated and blended together with pre-defined weights. This has the effect of smoothing out a non-animating scene, but comes at a performance cost because several extra frames will be rendered for each update.
trans-unit.target: 渐进式反锯齿仅在场景未更新时执行。当启用时,会强制更新,并以非常小的调整来呈现当前场景的状态,以活动摄像机的方向。最多可累积8个帧,并与预定义的权重混合在一起。这具有平滑非动画场景的效果,但会带来性能上的代价,因为每次更新都会额外渲染几帧。

trans-unit.source: Prohibits mouse events from being propagated to the widget's parent. This attribute is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 禁止将鼠标事件传播到小组件的父节点。此属性默认为禁用。

trans-unit.source: Project files contain all the information required by qmake to build your application, library, or plugin. Generally, you use a series of declarations to specify the resources in the project, but support for simple programming constructs enables you to describe different build processes for different platforms and environments.
trans-unit.target: 项目文件包含了qmake构建应用程序、库或插件所需的所有信息。一般来说,你会使用一系列的声明来指定项目中的资源,但对简单编程结构的支持使你能够为不同的平台和环境描述不同的构建过程。

trans-unit.source: ProjectedScreenPixelSizeThreshold Size of the entity when projected on the screen as seen from the selected camera, expressed in number of pixels on the side of the bounding square in screen space.
trans-unit.target: ProjectedScreenPixelSizeThreshold 投影到屏幕上时,从所选摄像机看到的实体的大小,以屏幕空间中边界方块边上的像素数表示。

trans-unit.source: Promotes this weak reference to a strong one and returns a QSharedPointer object holding that reference. When promoting to QSharedPointer, this function verifies if the object has been deleted already or not. If it hasn't, this function increases the reference count to the shared object, thus ensuring that it will not get deleted.
trans-unit.target: 将此弱引用提升为强引用，并返回保存该引用的QSharedPointer对象。升级为QSharedPointer时，此函数将验证对象是否已被删除。如果没有，此函数将增加对共享库的引用计数，从而确保它不会被删除。
将事件传播到每个项目

trans-unit.source: Proper cleanup is especially important due to context sharing. Even though each QOpenGLWidget's associated context is destroyed together with the QOpenGLWidget, the sharable resources in that context, like textures, will stay valid until the top-level window, in which the QOpenGLWidget lived, is destroyed. Additionally, settings like Qt::AA_ShareOpenGLContexts and some Qt modules may trigger an even wider scope for sharing contexts, potentially leading to keeping the resources in question alive for the entire lifetime of the application. Therefore the safest and most robust is always to perform explicit cleanup for all resources and resource wrappers used in the QOpenGLWidget.
trans-unit.target: 由于上下文共享，正确的清理尤其重要。即使每个QOpenGLWidget的关联上下文与QOpenGLWidget一起被销毁，该上下文中的可共享资源（如纹理）也将保持有效，直到销毁QOpenGLWidget所在的顶级窗口为止。此外，诸如Qt :: AA_ShareOpenGLContexts之类的设置和某些Qt模块可能会触发更广泛的共享上下文范围，从而可能导致在应用程序的整个生命周期中使相关资源保持活动状态。因此，最安全，最可靠的方法是始终对QOpenGLWidget中使用的所有资源和资源包装程序执行显式清理。

trans-unit.source: Proper cleanup is especially important due to context sharing. Even though each QOpenGLWidget's associated context is destroyed together with the QOpenGLWidget, the sharable resources in that context, like textures, will stay valid until the top-level window, in which the QOpenGLWidget lived, is destroyed. Additionally, settings like Qt::AA_ShareOpenGLContexts and some Qt modules may trigger an even wider scope for sharing contexts, potentially leading to keeping the resources in question alive for the entire lifetime of the application. Therefore the safest and most robust is always to perform explicit cleanup for all resources and resource wrappers used in the QOpenGLWidget.
trans-unit.target: 适当的清理由于上下文共享而显得尤为重要。即使每个QOpenGLWidget的关联上下文与QOpenGLWidget一起被销毁，该上下文中的可共享资源（如纹理）也将保持有效，直到销毁QOpenGLWidget所在的顶级窗口为止。此外，诸如Qt :: AA_ShareOpenGLContexts之类的设置和某些Qt模块可能会触发更大的范围来共享上下文，从而潜在地导致在应用程序的整个生命周期中使有问题的资源保持活动状态。因此，最安全，最可靠的方法是始终对QOpenGLWidget中使用的所有资源和资源包装程序执行显式清理。

trans-unit.source: Properties and signals that are not meant for the public interface may be marked with the \internal command. QDoc will not publish the documentation in the generated outputs.
trans-unit.target: 不适用于公共接口的属性和信号可以用\ internal命令标记。QDoc不会在生成的输出中发布文档。

trans-unit.source: Properties and signals/slots that have parameters using any other data types are ignored by the ActiveQt framework.
trans-unit.target: ActiveQt框架会忽略具有使用任何其他数据类型作为参数的参数的属性和信号/插槽。

trans-unit.source: Properties and signals/slots that have parameters using any other data types are ignored by the ActiveQt framework.
trans-unit.target: ActiveQt框架会忽略具有使用任何其他数据类型作为参数的参数的属性和信号/插槽。

trans-unit.source: Properties are a more general concept. They have a unique name, represented as an URI, but their value is void*. Thus nearly anything can be used as a property value. This concept involves some danger, though: there is no means of ensuring type-safety; the user must take care that they pass the right type. Properties are useful if a reader supports special handler classes.
trans-unit.target: 属性是一个更一般的概念。它们具有唯一的名称，以URI表示，但是它们的值为 void* 。因此几乎任何东西都可以用作属性值。但是，此概念涉及一些危险：无法确保类型安全。用户必须注意他们传递正确的类型。如果阅读器支持特殊的处理程序类，则属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: Properties are type safe. A property can only be assigned a value that matches the property type.
trans-unit.target: 属性是类型安全的。一个属性只能被分配一个与属性类型匹配的值。

trans-unit.source: Properties can also be dynamically updated via animations. The QtQuick import provides various animation types which can be used to animate changes to a property's value. In the following example, a property is animated which then gets displayed in a Text area:

trans-unit.source: Properties containing lists of QObject-derived types can also be exposed to QML. For this purpose, however, one should use QQmlListProperty rather than QList<T> as the property type. This is because QList is not a QObject-derived type, and so cannot provide the necessary QML property characteristics through the Qt meta object system, such as signal notifications when a list is modified.
trans-unit.target: 包含QObject派生类型列表的属性也可以公开给QML。但是，为此，应该使用QQmlListProperty而不是QList <T>作为属性类型。这是因为QList不是QObject派生的类型，因此无法通过Qt元对象系统提供必要的QML属性特征，例如，修改列表时的信号通知。

trans-unit.source: Properties exposed by the object's IDispatch implementation can be read and written through the property system provided by the Qt Object Model (both subclasses are QObjects, so you can use QObject::setProperty() and QObject::property()). Properties with multiple parameters are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过Qt对象模型提供的属性系统读写对象IDispatch实现公开的属性（两个子类都是QObject，因此可以使用QObject :: setProperty（）和QObject :: property（））。不支持带有多个参数的属性。

trans-unit.source: Properties inherited from QAbstractItemView are not covered by the property flags. Specifically, dragEnabled and acceptsDrops are computed by QListView when calling setMovement() or setViewMode().
trans-unit.target: 从QAbstractItemView继承的属性不受属性标志的限制。具体而言，dragEnabled和acceptsDrops通过计算而QListView调用时setMovement（）或setViewMode（）。

trans-unit.source: Properties of map overlay objects that influence their appearance on the display can be changed at any time, and many can also be used in animations. Animating coordinate-based map overlay objects, such as MapPolygon and MapPolyline, is not yet available.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时更改影响其在显示器上外观的地图叠加层对象的属性，许多属性也可以用于动画中。基于动画的基于坐标的地图叠加层对象（如MapPolygon和MapPolyline）尚不可用。

trans-unit.target: 根据数据模型的类型，模型的属性也可用。

trans-unit.source: Property aliases are properties which hold a reference to another property. Unlike an ordinary property definition, which allocates a new, unique storage space for the property, a property alias connects the newly declared property (called the aliasing property) as a direct reference to an existing property (the aliased property).
trans-unit.target: 属性别名是指持有对另一个属性的引用的属性。与普通属性定义不同的是,普通属性定义为属性分配了一个新的、唯一的存储空间,而属性别名则将新宣布的属性(称为别名属性)连接起来,作为对现有属性(别名属性)的直接引用。

trans-unit.source: Property names must begin with a lower case letter and can only contain letters, numbers and underscores. JavaScript reserved words are not valid property names. trans-unit.source: Property names must begin with a lower case letter and can only contain letters, numbers and underscores. JavaScript reserved words are not valid property names. The default, required, and readonly keywords are optional, and modify the semantics of the property being declared. See the upcoming sections on default properties, required properties and, read-only properties for more information about their respective meaning.
trans-unit.target: 属性名称必须以小写字母开头，并且只能包含字母，数字和下划线。JavaScript保留字不是有效的属性名称。在 default ， required 和 readonly 关键字是可选的，并修改所声明的属性的语义。有关默认属性，必需属性和只读属性的更多信息，请参见接下来的部分。

trans-unit.source: Provide UI resources such as images and icons for each display resolution that your application supports. The Qt Quick Controls 2 gallery example demonstrates this well by providing the qt-logo.png for @2x, @3x, and @4x resolutions, enabling the application to cater to high resolution displays. trans-unit.source: Provides a model index corresponding to the parent of any given child item. If the model index specified corresponds to a top-level item in the model, or if there is no valid parent item in the model, the function must return an invalid model index, created with the empty QModelIndex() constructor.
